data.name: Sum of The Salary
data.description:
*Objectives*
  • Function ```addPerson``` and ```getAllSalary``` have to be defined
Function ```addPerson```:
  • ```addPerson``` have four inputs - array, firstName, lastName, salary
  • ```addPerson``` have to add new person to array
  • Each person have to have three properties - ```firstName```, ```lastName```, ```salary```
  • ```firstName``` and ```lastName``` have to be strings, salary - number
  • ```addPerson``` shouldn't add new person if:
    • array provided (to which person will be added) is undefinied and/or is not an array
    • provided value for firstName is not string
    • provided value for lastName is not string
    • provided value for salary is not number
Function ```getAllSalary```:
  • iterates trough all people and sum up salaries
  • returns total of all salaries (number)
